title: Status logo is broken (iOS)
body:
# Problem

Status logo is broken on iOS

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/63525948-3835be80-c507-11e9-8225-ec23f49a5f92.png)


## Steps

1. open status
2. create account on iOS
@rachelhamlin
can't reproduce anymore
Reproducible again on nightly 03/09/2019

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 60.0 DAI (60.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $85,979.48 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
Cool - welcome aboard @gutsal-arsen, you're approved. :)
@StatusSceptre Thanks. Started. Will keep you posted.

@gutsal-arsen Hello from Gitcoin Core - are you still working on this issue? Please submit a WIP PR or comment back within the next 3 days or you will be removed from this ticket and it will be returned to an ‘Open’ status. Please let us know if you have questions!
* [x] reminder (3 days)
* [ ] escalation to mods (6 days)

@gitcoinbot having troubles logging in to Gitcoin since Friday past week. Solving with Gitcoin support. Will continue once solved. Sorry for that.
Okay, thanks for the heads up @agutsal. You aren't blocked on Status though, are you?
@StatusSceptre nope, seems generic Gitcoin bug. We've made some progress already. I'll update you

Looks like it's fixed now - I can login to gitcoin. Finishing and will update with PR soon.
Sorry for few days delay, @StatusSceptre
No problem @agutsal. We'll be on the lookout for your PR.

@agutsal Hello from Gitcoin Core - are you still working on this issue? Please submit a WIP PR or comment back within the next 3 days or you will be removed from this ticket and it will be returned to an ‘Open’ status. Please let us know if you have questions!
* [x] reminder (3 days)

<hr>

@agutsal due to inactivity, we have escalated [this issue](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567) to Gitcoin's moderation team. Let us know if you believe this has been done in error!

* [x] reminder (3 days)
* [x] escalation to mods (6 days)

Funders only: Snooze warnings for [1 day](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567?snooze=1) | [3 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567?snooze=3) | [5 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567?snooze=5) | [10 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567?snooze=10) | [100 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567?snooze=100)

@gitcoinbot I've been busy fighting with:
a) Gitcoin login bug
b) Gitcoin opera wallet integration bug
c) setting up dockerized `status-react` development environment.

a) is fixed. b) would not fix that fast, but I'll use workaround c) hopefuly will finish today

Once after that I'll submit PR. Had to setup `status` clojure+nix dev environment as I belive there are more work on `status-react` repo that I would hopefuly take.
Just ping me if you'd like support solving any of the issues with item c today - thanks for the update @agutsal!
@agutsal Gitcoin shouldn't block you from developing on Status though. Is it blocking your work flow in some way?

No, that's generic Gitcoin issue @rachelhamlin. There are bunch of issues on Gitcoin. I'm working currently. 

It took lot of time to setup Dockerized `Status+Nix` development environment.

Can yo tell me if `make run-desktop` works normally or not tested (consider `make startdev-desktop` and `make react-native-desktop` are running in other terminals)? Have problems with it.

@agutsal Hello from Gitcoin Core - are you still working on this issue? Please submit a WIP PR or comment back within the next 3 days or you will be removed from this ticket and it will be returned to an ‘Open’ status. Please let us know if you have questions!

Issue Status: 1. Open 2. **Cancelled** 

<hr>

__Workers have applied to start work__.


These users each claimed they can complete the work by 6 months, 2 weeks ago.
Please review their action plans below:


**1) [ianfinn1994](https://gitcoin.co/ianfinn1994) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=ianfinn1994) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=ianfinn1994))_.**

I will debug the app and fix the status logo.

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8818/3567).
